N

NES_FPS - Static variable in class client.userInterface.panels.tetris.TetrisPanel
The specific FPS used for NES emulation accuracy (approx 60.09 Hz for NTSC, but logic often uses 50-60).

Request to find a random opponent for NES (Classic) Tetris.

Nintendo Rotation System (used in classic NES Tetris).
